ChangeNote: Internal - Ensure proper rename of Db fields for Collateral tables to avoid align script to fial
for OneLib Mid curve swaptions, when filling correlation data for interpolation, interpolate first in rows  and then in option maturities
When exporting a segment using Calculation definitions the configuration dependency to CALCDEFS was missing. This has been corrected.
Remove A_COLLATERAL_SUBRESULTS.MIN_RETURN_AMOUNT field from Standard Reports
When saving fund figures Oracle could in some cases chose a none optimal execution, leading to bad performance. A database hint has been added to ensure Oracle uses the relevant index.
Internal change. Not user visible.
Refining and refactoring classes that handling implicit joins and join paths
The performance of the 'Portfolio Calculations' 'Recalculation changed' initialize process has been improved.
Correct distribution of EOP values on match lot level on IN-legs of CA Merger II transaction. Fix for Golden equation on positions after CA
This is an internal technical SimCorp change that do not affect any customer
Not possible to import REPPOOLFLDS due to cyclic references. This has been corrected.

If enabled (Process messages on the same queue, for the same portfolio, in creation order) the receiver service will now ensure messages for each portfolio are processed in the same order as they were inserted into the queue.
During startup of SimCorp Dimnesion an error could occur where no proper error message was displayed, making troubleshooting  difficult. This has been corrected.

In Asset manager (Simulations applet) in FX Single currency window security is now filled after base/price currency is filled. This ensures correct security selection according to FX simulations defaults.
AutoTest Coverage
When using the formula function  'gettransfreecom' an unexpected amount of whitespaces was added. This has been fixed.
Added a new translation External account No. -> Custody account.
GROUPCODEVALS dependency is added to the Compliance Rule configuration transport if Group Code attribute with textual value defines the rule.
This is an internal change. The change has no customer impact. Decreased flakyness in AltInv LookThrough GUI integration tests.
Implementing the alignment logic for index adjustment-related values on the EOP transaction.
No visible changes for end-user. Adds unit tests to cover behavior of the new enhanced netting rules.

After the CDS reversioning transaction, the new position could not be netted due to inconsistency in the security and original transaction number in the nominal match holdings. Here it has been fixed, the position netting transaction can be successfully saved.
Expect correct number of connections from pool, and use retry mechanism when pool is full
Fix failed tests due to changed output format. Does not affect business logic.

When allocating order block allocations from the Order Manager using a CDS Index standard product, an error message saying "Standard Product ID is a mandatory field and must be specified if Security group is defined as False" could occur. The missing ID is now populated with a Standard Product ID.
Run experiment with new solution and compare results: Experiment 3 with settings 4.20.0.0/4.15.0.0. )
Internal change. Not user visible.
GUI integration tests making comparisons of timestamps should be less flaky now and failures easier to diagnose.
Fix ORA-00001: unique constraint violation (SCDAT.P_DWHSYNCACTIONS) during Import of DATAWAREHOUSE entity
Cover all VMD code in CODEOWNERS
Add additional validation to Instrument Exception Settings window
Added support for Color controls.
Flaky unit test fixed.
A tab 'Investment Analytics Service - FIPA' has been made configurable.

A correction is made to the factor based FIPA fair cash flow on decomposed spot legs of IRF positions in Performance Calculation. This affects the fair cash flow itself as well as the factor based FIPA local return, when this is calculated using the TWR based approach. The correction ensures that the cash flow adjustment is consistently based on exposure, which removes spikes in the factor based FIPA local return on decomposed IRF positions on days with buy or sell transactions.
Fix handling of multiple whitespaces by portal search regex strategy
Flaky test ignored
Use a different counting mechanism

Information from the 2T layout regarding sorting could result in a crash due to 3T layout being influenced by this setting. The 2T layout should not be applied as it is always overwritten anyways. This has been fixed.
No visible changes for user. Refactoring: fix architecture violations in Reconciliation codebase.
Update gap tool with new accomplishments
Added Shortcuts menu item to application help menu
Internal change. Not visible to clients.
Introduced new Web API interface for Transaction Search.
Enabling tests
When a user clicks the "Open Match" button on the form "Central Trade Manager", sometimes 2 similar error messages appear.  Now the 1st message is shown only.
Two Front office data service load balancers could handle the service queue in case of reconnection to another MUCS and two such services run.  This has now been corrected.
Fix Asset Manager Cache API crash when we use GroupBy at web API request
Test was using incorrect adapter, it has been fixed
Ensure that for MidCurve Swaptions the interpolated correlation cannot be outside the [-1,1] limits.
Assertion error has been fixed
Flaky test ignored
Flaky test ignored
refactoring
Disable recalculation of notional when dictated by block

When using the  PKR queue handler worker service the warning 'Attempt to write a negative number into PKR performance counters (type: Current calculation workload in progress)' occurred very frequently.  The error message now explains why this could have happened and that the negative performance counter value is ignored.
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve data validation during OTC data import. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
A problem with generic payment matching using manual payment reconciliation and external netting was found and fixed

For External and Internal message queues add a mechanism to check if the data received from DB (that is used to update Int and Ext message queues) represents the correct "Security" in scope of the requested "Transaction No".

This defect removes the warning when saving more Loan Facility repricing transactions, where  unsettled repricepayout(s) are present in the group of repricing transaction to be saved, and where a "crossover" ratio>1 can occur, and is allowed.
Fixed defect
YieldForMathAdjSold should be calculated for average financial accounting method
Internal change. Not user visible.
The new functionality was covered by Brick tests
Skip redistribution of carried nominal for internal trade, so it will not be recalculated.
Prevent unhandled exception in IConfiguration for net8 services
Use Logical Thread id
Dont rely on UP values from framework.Data as much as possible
Internal change. Not user visible

Rounding rules were not applied to the suggested margin amount for Margin Call with Return/Recall actions when the setting in Collateral Manager setup => Collateral Calculations => "Ignore MTA and rounding on full return/recall amount" is On. It was fixed.
Read ApiBaseURLPrefix dynamically from cnf.ini
Internal change. Not visible for users.
UP Dbi unit test code has been improved
Now, we have brick for Validate Market Data Using Service Platform window also.
Use Pinned Connection
Internal change. Not user visible
The potential erroneous situation during test run has been mitigated
Reduce workspace requirement during initialisation phase of position calculation during decomposition
A crash occurs if "SWIFT name" contains illegal characters in payment auxiliary job.  This has been fixed.
Logical form L2 test was flaky due to a deadlock happening when multiple tests were competing for the same resource.
Internal change, not affecting customer functionality. Optimized some Private Debt internal flow tests.

A program error would occur in the window Money Market Benchmark Definitions when creating a new definition, adding values to one or more fields, afterwards making all fields empty again. This has been resolved.
Added a temporary solution for the overflowed vertical tab headers
Connection Test and Connection Information can use the new Cloud Data Warehouse API service as backend, rather than Reporting Data Jobs Service.  Configurable via a cnf.ini file parameter
Internal change. Not user visible
Save button is active when template has not been saved yet
Populate the POR field on the external message queue from the contents of the message.

As part of streamed data selection content,  when portfolio segment is used or when only portfolio group is filled in the Portfolio section, no portfolio is found. Missing handling is implemented here.
Flaky test ignored
refactor integration tests
SCD development keyboard layouts and toolbars to include Iota Underbar and Left Shoe Underbar APL functions
Change  0 values in generated file to empty, fix validations issues
correction

"Value filled PC absolute" and "Value filled QC absolute" was 100x the value as expected in OOB for Finished orders with special currency (like GBp/GBP). This was corrected together with Indicative price.
Improved work flow on APL side for function sceFutBond2Keys
Prevent crash that could happen when validating capitalising bond static data when the first non-zero pool factor is the first row.
Not able to import Performance Calculations (PERFORM) using 'NAV Performance' as scope. This has been corrected.
Unit tests has been added with examples of how SimCorp Dimension developers can use the new Unified Platform Database Interface query language
Support horizontal and vertical grid lines
YieldForMathAdjSold to be present in MPV and TL
Loading UP DBI when  running in users mode.
For the new opening contract 'Effective date' should be copied from the initial contract if the 'Rolling dates' set to 'Payment dates'. Otherwise, 'First valuation date' should be copied.
DWH: Technical debt removal
NA

Now, if a transaction that has only outgoing messages is selected, then the "Open Match" button of the form "Central Trade Manager" is enabled. If you press the button, the form "Match" will open and the tab "Deviations" will be activated. The figures of deviations will look like you get an empty (contains only zeros) confirmation message.
Resolve leak in UP ConnectionPool and F.Data.Managed
xAssert was changed to a proper xs error
Error importing formulas using the getrepdatapool function.
created unit tests
Technical code refactoring - no production changes
The STP workflow for mass update must be able to update costs on transactions
Add support for context menu to API Logical Form Test Framework
This is a refactoring. No changes to customer functionality
Added validation rule to Float Rate Index Definitions form. Now Customer Business Centre only allowed for TRSs
A program error during mass export has been fixed.

Validation improved when saving a portfolio authorisation segment. If trying to save a segment which will return all portfolios, e.g. the only condition in the segment is 'Portfolio group is not null' then the system will stop this, and suggest the user to save this as an empty segment instead.
Add pFXRATEUNSETTRADEQP into tTRANSGCVAL/bufTRANSGCVAL for proper P/L calculation on Settle Loan Facilities transactions.
Update InputFieldDefinition fields when a new row is created
Flaky test ignored
Interal: Create a unit test that verifies consistency of default values
Added support for using translation in STP Receiver filter.
Change of internal tests. No clients impacted.
1T pmnt freq is now available in the drop down in case of empty interest type in IRS
UDKR weight fields were not excluded from calculation and streaming, fixed now.
Flaky test fixed
Define vartypes for some fp pointers which previously used PtrVT override
Improve type safety for code related to key ratio mappings
Internal change. Not user visible
Improve AltInv GUI integration tests error handling, to help with diagnosing failures and improve tests adding rows into grids with existing sorted fields.
removed axioma and java base path from UI
Flaky test ignored
Increasing api test coverage for delta vector
Fix crash when Risk Instrument Exception Settings -Upload batch task is running
Connections to the database are not properly configured
The Rule entry - Credit Risk fields Collateral, issuer risk and Collateral, cpt. risk have now been re-enabled for holding base rules.
NA
In Edit Multiple Securities - Bonds screen, the fields 'Coupon freqency (months)' and 'Redemption freqency (months)', will now have 'frequency' correctly spelt.
Internal codebase refactoring. Fixed the code to improve the internal rule evalution mechanism. Changes made to the code do not affect system behaviour.
The lifetime for liquidating funds has been slightly adjusted so additional distributions are forecasted.
Internal work in OTC Core: Merge innovation work into main/master
QC and PC key ratios were not not calculated for mid-curve swaptions using OneLib valuation. Resolved by setting pool factor to 1
Fixed incorrect status calculated in broker statement reconciliation when having both statement.
Flaky test has been fixed and re-enabled again.
New Cloud Data Warehouse API service
Fix a crash in OM allocation message processing for FX swaps
[TECHNICAL/3T]  Re-enabled filter viewing. Item fields of item type 1, that are not drop-downs, should still have item sets.
An internal unit test did not test the code properly. The error has been corrected.
added check for BatchSUbform
Remove StackTraces
FIPA effect calculation batch job: It is  no longer possible to save a batch job of type "FIPA effect calculation", if a  FIPA effect calculation definition isn't attached

The 'Benchmark Calculation - Upload Results' batch job will now filter the SAAM target weights, so it only includes structures that contain relevant model portfolios. Target weights will thus be filtered away if they are defined on a "dummy" structure that is based on model portfolios for which SAAM weights have never been calculated in Benchmark Calculation.
Change in internal tests, no impact on customer installations

A correction to how the transaction code is filled and cleared on the Paydown Loan Facility transaction, ensuring all validations are triggered when changing the contract upon modification of the transaction
The performance of generation of new GL holding keys have been improved.
Interact with checkbox via its label
